title: dynamic-config-update
description: Fields which can be updated in a dynamic config

description.description: A brief summary of what the dynamic config is being used for.
description.example: an updated summary of what this dynamic config does

idType.description: The type of ID which the dynamic config is based on.

defaultValue.description: The fallback JSON object when no rules are triggered.

defaultValueJsonC.description: Same as DefaultValue, but can accept comments. Only accepts valid JSON-C. Either this field or defaultValue must be provided, but providing both will throw an error.

tags.description: a list of tag names to attach to the dynamic config

schema.description: A schema using JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 to enforce return values of this dynamic config's rules. When submitting a schema, all submitted return values (default value and rule return values) must match the schema.
